name: @logo-software/perspective
description: The perspective module gives perspective to elements, using the  Perspective feature of the CSS by mouse move size.

scripts.postversion:
echo '#########
### Versioning to:' $npm_package_version '
### CommandPATH: ' $INIT_CWD '
#########' && git status
scripts.git-commit: git add -A . && git commit . -m $TYPE'('$npm_package_name'): upgrading to v.'$npm_package_version
scripts.git-release: git add -A . && git commit . -m $TYPE'('$npm_package_name'): cut the v.'$npm_package_version' release'
scripts.patch:commit: npm run ver:patch && npm run build && TYPE=fix npm run git-commit
scripts.minor:commit: npm run ver:minor && npm run build && TYPE=feat npm run git-commit
scripts.pre:commit: npm run ver:pre && npm run build && TYPE=prerelease npm run git-commit
scripts.major:commit: npm run ver:major && TYPE=release npm run git-release
